characterInfo.Occupation: Prostitute (formerly),  Member of the Unseen Court

characterDescription: Beryl is a former prostitute whom Radiant recruits.

characterDetails.Appearance: Beryl is tall with luscious dark hair and a perfectly tan skin tone. She uses Lightweaving to enhance her appearance.
characterDetails.Character: She reminds Veil of Jasnah, only more relaxed.
